context.p: If you want your source files to have no indenting (that is, for all lines to be flush left) when formatting and indenting of the source occurs, adjust the following settings.

step.cmd: If you want all documents to have zero indent, regardless of their current indent, deselect Detect indent on open and set Indent size to 0.

If you want documents that have zero indent already to retain zero indent, but allow other document to have to have zero indent, regardless of their current indent, deselect Detect indent on open and set Indent size to 0.
